title: The Best Ramen!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hanamaru-chan! Hanamaru-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>R-, Rin-chan! Good day zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You see, Rin brought some ramen for you to try today nya, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru will go to the ramen shop with you, Rin-chan! But Maru isn’t really that good at slurping noodles....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You don’t have to slurp it. It’s crunchy. Look, ta-daa, it’s a ramen snack nya~! These are so good~. Here, put out your hand Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Oooh.... Thanks for the food.... *Munch Munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s delicious zura~! Is this soy sauce ramen flavor?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah. Rin also brought some others. Let’s go eat them at the park~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ramen tastes best when enjoyed with you zura, Rin-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
